name: Elton Gao's Projects
tagline: Trying hard to combine art and technology
body:
# My Open Sourced Projects: 

***

### Next GRT: Kitchender-Waterloo's only bilingual bus assistant
[Projet Repo](http://github.com/gyfelton/NextGRT-iPhone)

[Project Home Page](http://gyfelton.github.com/NextGRT-iPhone/)

[Next GRT is available on App Store](http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/next-grt/id506292406?ls=1&mt=8)

***

### iPad-LearnEverything:  An iPad game for children to learn Chinese and for teacher to easily create questions
[Projet Repo](http://github.com/gyfelton/iPad-LearnEverything)

[Project Home Page](http://gyfelton.github.com/iPad-LearnEverything/)

***

### WatPark:  An Windows Phone 8 App developed in one night to display parking lots information of University of Waterloo
[Projet Repo](http://github.com/gyfelton/WP8-WatPark)

[Project Home Page](http://gyfelton.github.com/WP8-WatPark/)

[WatPark is available on App Store](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/watpark/4e479fdd-d5c8-4715-8818-b5c63885f050)

***
***

# Other published apps:

[eatTO Official iOS App - 一同美食黄页](http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/yi-tong-mei-shi-huang-ye/id551261942?ls=1&mt=8)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
